scripts.build:stable: yarn gen:stable && yarn add -D @isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo@portal:./stable && yarn install && yarn ts-monorepo
scripts.build:rapid: yarn add -D @isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo@portal:./packages/@isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo~ && yarn install && yarn start:rapid
scripts.vscode: yarn add -D @yarnpkg/pnpify && yarn pnpify --sdk && yarn remove @yarnpkg/pnpify
scripts.publish:beta: npm login && npm publish --tag next --access public ./packages/@isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo~/package.tgz
scripts.publish:release: npm login && npm publish --tag release --access public ./packages/@isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo~/package.tgz
scripts.publish:both: npm login && npm publish --tag release --tag next --access public ./packages/@isomorphic-typescript/ts-monorepo~/package.tgz
